{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Open-Mesh |model=MR500 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B007PVBYHU |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/22/2009 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR7750 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |cpu2_brand=Ralink |cpu2_model=RT2880 |cpu2_cspeed=266 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2=2 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2=16 |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT2880 |wi2_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip2_model=RT2850 |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=open-mesh |default_ssid_regex=^open-mesh$ |default_ip= |default_user=root |default_pass=0p3nm35h |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F }} [http://www.cloudtrax.com/datasheets/MR500%20datasheet.pdf Datasheet]
This device is a [[EnGenius ESR7750|EnGenius (Senao) ESR7750]]. The FCC ID of the parent OEM product has thus been assigned to this device.
The PoE implementation in this device consists of a Passive PoE feed with pins +4,5 and -7,8 at 18 VDC.
